lyrics.stanza: Lord Jesus, I love You, No other one for me will do. I love You, just love You. Without You, Lord, I am through.
No other one for me will do. My heart is drawn, I just love You. I just love You, dear Lord.
As mercy, You reached me. You laid aside Your glory. You're God, Lord, the Almighty, Yes You became a slave for me.
What kind of love You have for man, Beyond our power to comprehend! I love You, Lord Jesus.
I'm evil and fallen. My nature, Lord, is just sin. You're righteous and holy. All that You are was condemning me.
What made You Lord to die for me? You joined man's race and took my place, Redeeming us Jesus.
You died, Lord, on Calvary. Your blood is flowing now for me. Your blood, Lord, is precious. O, what a price You paid for us!
No tongue or pen can ever tell: Your mercy reached me down in hell. You reached me, Lord Jesus.
